Verification—requirements:
Verification is performed by a third party, not by the firm itself, on a firm-wide basis.
This third party verifier must attest that (1) the firm has complied with all GIPS
requirements for composite construction on a firm-wide basis and (2) the firm's processes
and procedures are established to present performance in accordance with the calculation
methodology required by GIPS, the data requirements of GIPS, and in the format
required by GIPS.
